'''Andrew''' is the son-in-law of [[Nora (Nothing to Fear)|Nora]].

==History==
Andrew came into the practice with his fiancée, [[Tina (Private Practice)|Tina]], and her mother, Nora. He had helped Tina get Nora, who had severe agoraphobia, out of the house to go to her therapy session. Tina wanted Nora to be able to attend their wedding the next day.

The next day, he and Tina got married and Nora was present, with Violet beside her for support.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Tina (Private Practice)|Tina]].
